allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Initial commit: NBA DFS Lineup Optimizer

Full-stack application for building and optimizing NBA DFS lineups for DraftKings.

Features:
- Advanced projection algorithm with multiple factors (defense, pace, position matchups, vegas, rest days)
- RotoWire data integration with custom projections
- Linear programming optimizer for generating optimal lineups
- AI chat assistant powered by OpenAI/Azure OpenAI
- Mobile-responsive UI with card/table views
- Real-time player pool filtering and sorting
- Lineup builder with DraftKings position constraints
- SQLite database for data persistence

Tech Stack:
- Backend: Node.js, Express, SQLite (better-sqlite3)
- Frontend: React, Vite, Tailwind CSS
- AI: OpenAI API / Azure OpenAI
- Optimizer: javascript-lp-solver

Project Structure:
- /backend: Express API server with projection and optimization logic
- /frontend: React SPA with responsive design
- Mobile-optimized with hamburger navigation and touch-friendly UI

Generated with Claude Code
https://claude.com/claude-code
EOF
)")
